metadata.title: Collective Invoice - Simplify Event Billing & Accounting
metadata.description: Streamline your event accounting with Event Logic's collective invoice feature. Get one consolidated bill for all your event expenses.

hero.title: Collective Invoice
hero.subtitle: Simplify your accounting with one consolidated invoice for all event-related expenses, regardless of how many suppliers are involved.

overview.title: One Event, One Invoice
overview.description: Managing multiple invoices from different suppliers can be a nightmare for your accounting department. Our collective invoice feature consolidates all expenses into a single, comprehensive bill.

singleInvoice.title: Single Consolidated Invoice
singleInvoice.description: Receive one comprehensive invoice that includes all services from multiple suppliers for each event.

automaticConsolidation.title: Automatic Consolidation
automaticConsolidation.description: All supplier charges are automatically collected and consolidated into one easy-to-process invoice.

detailedBreakdown.title: Detailed Cost Breakdown
detailedBreakdown.description: See exactly what you're paying for with itemized costs from each supplier clearly displayed.

taxHandling.title: Smart Tax Handling
taxHandling.description: Automatic VAT calculations and tax compliance across different supplier jurisdictions.

customBranding.title: Custom Branding
customBranding.description: Invoices can be customized with your company branding and specific formatting requirements.

multiCurrency.title: Multi-Currency Support
multiCurrency.description: Handle international suppliers with automatic currency conversion and consolidated billing.

reducedAdmin.title: Reduced Administration
reducedAdmin.description: Cut invoice processing time by up to 80% with consolidated billing

betterTracking.title: Better Cost Tracking
betterTracking.description: Easy budget tracking and expense reporting with centralized invoicing

improvedCashFlow.title: Improved Cash Flow
improvedCashFlow.description: Better payment terms and simplified approval processes

compliance.title: Compliance Ready
compliance.description: Automatic compliance with accounting standards and company policies

steps.title: Book Multiple Services
steps.description: Book venues, catering, equipment, and other services from different suppliers

steps.title: Automatic Collection
steps.description: All supplier charges are automatically collected in our system

steps.title: Invoice Generation
steps.description: One comprehensive invoice is generated with all costs consolidated

steps.title: Review & Approve
steps.description: Review the detailed breakdown before final approval and payment

steps.title: Single Payment
steps.description: Make one payment to cover all event expenses

savings.title: Cost Savings
savings.description: Organizations typically save 15-25% on administrative costs and reduce invoice processing time significantly.

cta.title: Ready to Simplify Your Event Billing?
cta.subtitle: Join organizations that have streamlined their event accounting with our collective invoice feature.
